com.ae.apps.lib.permissions

Class RuntimePermissionChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ae.apps.lib.permissions.RuntimePermissionChecker

  • public class RuntimePermissionChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to check and handle RuntimePermissions. Use this in an Activity or Fragment that implements PermissionsAwareComponent
    Since:
    3.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkPermissions()
      Checks if the required permissions are already granted or informs the component that permissions are required
      void handlePermissionsResult(java.lang.String[] permissions, int[] grantResults)
      Does the validation whether all permissions were granted Since the callback for requestPermissions comes to the component, this method needs to be explicitly invoked to check the result
      static RuntimePermissionChecker newInstance(PermissionsAwareComponent component)
      Get a new instance of RuntimePermissionChecker

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static RuntimePermissionChecker newInstance(PermissionsAwareComponent component)
        Get a new instance of RuntimePermissionChecker
        Parameters:
        component - a component
        Returns:
        an instance of RuntimePermissionChecker

      • checkPermissions

        public void checkPermissions()
        Checks if the required permissions are already granted or informs the component that permissions are required

      • handlePermissionsResult

        public void handlePermissionsResult(java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                    int[] grantResults)
        Does the validation whether all permissions were granted Since the callback for requestPermissions comes to the component, this method needs to be explicitly invoked to check the result
        Parameters:
        permissions - permissions that were requested
        grantResults - grant result of permissions
